obfuscation: ﻿ The Decline of the Birth-rate in Sweden A negative trend that can be observed in the Swedish society of today is the decline of the birth-rate .
original: ﻿ The Decline of the Birth-rate in Sweden  A negative trend that can be observed in the Swedish society of today is the decline of the birth-rate.

obfuscation: In 1990 the number of children born in Sweden was 120 000 , in 1994 it was 110 000 and in 1998 it was as abject as 89 000 .
original: In 1990 the number of children born in Sweden was 120 000, in 1994 it was 110 000 and in 1998 it was as low as 89 000.

obfuscation: The number of deceased persons were 95 000 , 92 000 and 93 000 respectively - in other words , there is an excess of deaths over births .
original: The number of deceased persons was 95 000, 92 000 and 93 000 respectively - in other words, there is an excess of deaths over births.

obfuscation: At the same time the total population of Sweden increased from 8,6 million people in 1990 to 8,8 million in 1994 and to 8,9 million in 1998 .
original: At the same time the total population of Sweden increased from 8,6 million people in 1990 to 8,8 million in 1994 and to 8,9 million in 1998.

obfuscation: These statistics , which I have obtained from the homepage of the SCB , illuminate this trend very clearly .
original: These statistics, which I have obtained from the homepage of the SCB, illuminate this trend very clearly.

obfuscation: But what are the reasons for this phenomenon ?
original: But what are the reasons for this phenomenon?

obfuscation: The independent cause of the low birth-rate is the economic situation .
original: The main cause of the low birth-rate is the economic situation.

obfuscation: It is simply besides expensive for many people to bring up children in our society .
original: It is simply too expensive for many people to bring up children in our society.

obfuscation: Therefore family planning has become usual .
original: Therefore family planning has become usual.

obfuscation: The possibility to avoid unwanted pregnancies through preventives or the alternative to go through a legal abortion has of course had a very great impact on the birth-rates .
original: The possibility to avoid unwanted pregnancies through preventives or the alternative to go through a legal abortion has of course had a very great impact on the birth-rates.

obfuscation: The child allowance far from cover the loss of income during pregnancy , maternity leave and all early expenses involved when raising a child .
original: The child allowance far from cover the loss of income during pregnancy, maternity leave and all other expenses involved when raising a child.

obfuscation: Many couples decide to become parents by and by in life after having obtained a good job and earned some money and paid off their debts .
original: Many couples decide to become parents later in life after having obtained a good job and earned some money and paid off their debts.

obfuscation: Sometimes the decision is made besides late and others never reach the point in life when they decide that the time to bring children into the world has come .
original: Sometimes the decision is made too late and others never reach the point in life when they decide that the time to bring children into the world has come.

obfuscation: Furthermore , women 's status in society has gone through a radical change .
original: Furthermore, women's position in society has gone through a radical change.

obfuscation: Formerly a woman was expected to give birth to children and take care of the household .
original: Formerly a woman was expected to give birth to children and take care of the household.

obfuscation: These were her major tasks in life .
original: These were her major tasks in life.

obfuscation: Nowadays women have the opportunity of achieving the same positions in business and professional life as men .
original: Nowadays women have the opportunity of achieving the same positions in business and professional life as men.

obfuscation: Consequently , this has influenced the female way of life .
original: Consequently, this has influenced the female way of life.

obfuscation: After compulsory school an increasing number of young men and women continue their studies , at university for example .
original: After compulsory school an increasing number of young men and women continue their studies, at university for example.

obfuscation: The studies often take many years to complete and giving birth to a child during that time is not what most women desire .
original: The studies often take many years to complete and giving birth to a child during that time is not what most women desire.

obfuscation: After the studies quite a few women want to make a carrier and when they intend to climb the ladder of success children are not considered convenient .
original: After the studies quite a few women want to make a carrier and when they intend to climb the ladder of success children are not considered convenient.

obfuscation: therefore women neither have the time nor want to raise children .
original: Thus women neither have the time nor want to raise children.

obfuscation: It has now become more socially accepted than earlier to get a carrier instead of choosing ordinary family-life if you can not combine them .
original: It has now become more socially accepted than earlier to have a carrier instead of choosing ordinary family-life if you cannot combine them.

obfuscation: What may the effects of this decline of the birth-rate exist ?
original: What may the effects of this decline of the birth-rate be?

obfuscation: The most terrifying aspect is that it makes the economy of the state weak .
original: The most terrifying aspect is that it makes the economy of the country weak.

obfuscation: This may need some further explanation .
original: This may need some further explanation.

obfuscation: The number of people above the age of 60 was in 1990 18 % of the total population in the OECD-countries ( Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development ) and statisticians have reached the conclusion that the number will be 30 % in 2030 .
original: The number of people above the age of 60 was in 1990 18% of the total population in the OECD-countries (Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development) and statisticians have reached the conclusion that the number will be 30% in 2030.

obfuscation: In early words , the number of retired people will increase and thus the state-budgets will have to be used to take care of old people instead of the younger generation .
original: In other words, the number of retired people will increase and thus the state-budgets will have to be used to take care of old people instead of the younger generation.

obfuscation: This will lead to reduced contributions as regards education and the consequence will be a deteriorated school-system .
original: This will lead to reduced contributions as regards education and the consequence will be a deteriorated school-system.

obfuscation: The result will be a generation of people without sufficient education .
original: The result will be a generation of people without sufficient education.

obfuscation: Swedish know-how will decrease and thus weaken the Swedish economy .
original: Swedish know-how will decrease and thus weaken the Swedish economy.

obfuscation: Also other contributions , for instance means for the infrastructure and the military , will diminish and the state will slowly begin to decay .
original: Also other contributions, for instance means for the infrastructure and the military, will diminish and the country will slowly begin to decay.

obfuscation: Nevertheless , the troublesome problem with unemployment will fade away when the workers of today retire and their professional posts must be filled .
original: Nevertheless, the troublesome problem with unemployment will fade away when the workers of today retire and their professional posts must be filled.

obfuscation: Provided that the school-system however is satisfactory the young people will have no difficulty in finding jobs .
original: Provided that the school-system still is satisfactory the young people will have no difficulty in finding jobs.

obfuscation: This will , hopefully , lead to a rapid growth in society and Sweden will catch up with what was lost during the time of `` depression '' .
original: This will, hopefully, lead to a rapid development in society and Sweden will catch up with what was lost during the time of "depression".

obfuscation: In the retentive run this decreasing rate of nativity might be very healthy for the economy of the country , but the change should take place at a slower pace than it does at the moment .
original: In the long run this decreasing rate of nativity might be very healthy for the economy of the country, but the change should take place at a slower pace than it does at the moment.

obfuscation: Attempts have been made from the government to encourage people to get more children .
original: Attempts have been made from the government to encourage people to have more children.

obfuscation: In conclusion this trend of decline of the birth-rate is ascribable to the difficult economic situation of the last years .
original: In conclusion this trend of decline of the birth-rate is due to the difficult economic situation of the last years.

obfuscation: Lately signs indicate that the economic situation is improving and if this is the case , the birth-rate about certainly will improve .
original: Lately signs indicate that the economic situation is improving and if this is the case, the birth-rate most certainly will improve.

obfuscation: The fact that women make carriers credibly does not influence the birth-rate as much as the economic situation does .
original: The fact that women make carriers probably does not influence the birth-rate as much as the economic situation does.
